title: Zaineb Smida
text:
Associate professor (Maître de conférences) at INSA Lyon, France, since September 2023, and a member of the PSPM team at Institut Camille Jordan. I defended my Ph.D under the supervision of Ali Gannoun and Lionel Cucala at [University of Montpellier](https://www.umontpellier.fr/) in November 2021.



Functional Data Analysis
Scan Statistics
Statistical Testing
Spatial Statistics
